price: 82. Tada, jei jie nusigręžia, tavo (Muchammedai ﷺ ) pareiga yra tik aiškiai perduoti (Žinią).
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw fa-innamā ʿalayka al-balāghu al-mubīnu
